@lalalatonii Hi, Maritoni. We're sorry to hear this. Please know that we do not mean to cause you any disservice with your experience with us. 

We're trying to send you a DM for us to assist you further, but we're unable to. Kindly make sure the feature is enabled on your profile.
@engrsun Hi, Marlou. Please be informed that fare rates vary on several factors such as travel date, travel destination, service class and seat availability. Thank you.
@mikorockss Thank you for your kind words, Miko!

@AmritaDecruz Hi, Amrita. Per the station concerned, you may have the item checked in and you'll be assisted to drop the item at overside or you may opt to carry it until the boarding gate and it will be intercepted by one of our agents.
@asianreindeer24 Hi, Bambi. How can we help?
@real_perjperj Hi, Bunbun. Visa information is not yet required while booking. However, we highly suggest  to have the complete requirements before booking to avoid any inconvenience.

@mikorockss We strive to make our passengers feel our #BuongPusongAlaga and we're glad to hear that Ella was able to provide you with assistance, Miko. We'll have this forwarded to the office concerned for their appreciation. Thank you and stay safe!
@mikorockss Our apologies for the inconvenience, Miko. Can you send us a dm with your booking details so we can look into this?
@junglebeam We're truly sorry to hear this, @junglebeam. May we know your flight route as well?
@FSmeshniuk Hi, Fedor. Allow us to send a follow-up on your behalf. Our apologies for the delay.
@junglebeam Hi, @junglebeam. We replied to your other tweet. Thank you.

urls.title: Sports equipment
urls.description: A special service offered by Philippine Airlines (PAL) on Domestic flights, allowing passengers to avail of additional sports baggage on top of their free baggage allowance and prepaid baggage up to 4-hours before estimated time of departure. Dimensions: Regardless of the actual dimension, it will be considered as a piece of baggage equivalent to 62 inches (158cms). Set: Consist of one pair of snow skis, one pair of ski poles and one pair of ski boots. Any sets of snow ski equipment in excess of one will

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

urls.title: PAL flights for October and beyond
urls.description: As countries reopen for travel, we continue to build up our network. Here are the flights we are operating: ALERT: Please check regularly for flight schedule updates, as flights may be adjusted or cancelled due to government-imposed travel or arrival restrictions. For updates on entry requirements for various countries, please check the government website of your country of destination. You may also check: Covid-19 Travel Guide. Note: Flights may stop over in Vancouver if needed due to airspace restriction

urls.title: Student
urls.description: Refers to any Filipino citizen currently enrolled in a duly authorized elementary, secondary, technical-vocational, or higher education institution. The term does not include those enrolled in post graduate degree courses and informal short-term courses such as dancing, swimming, music, driving lessons, and seminar-type courses.

urls.title: Fill | myPAL Request Hub
urls.description: Booking requests at your fingertips. The myPAL Request Hub provides passengers with convenient servicing options. Through this secure online form, you can request the following transactions wherever you are: • Rebook due to schedule change, travel restrictions, or cancellations • Convert your Ticket to a Travel Credit • Request for refund • Follow-up on an existing request You can use this online facility in 3 easy steps: 1. Fill out the form 2. Click SUBMIT 3. Receive a confirmation via email Important Reminders: • For more information on your booking change options, visit https://bit.ly/PALPassengerOptions page. • For tickets issued by our partner travel agents, requests on booking changes must be made through your issuing travel agent. • myPAL Request Hub can assist requests for changes to confirmed bookings on Philippine Airlines flights which were made through the PAL Website, PAL Mobile App, PAL Ticket Offices, or PAL’s Reservations Hotline.
